reference.title: Adding delegate hosts to a resource pool

section.p: To perform this procedure, the root user on the master host has to gain access to the root user account on delegate hosts through Secure Shell (SSH). If the root user on delegate hosts are not configured for password access, configure them for key-based access before starting this procedure.

If the master and delegate host are configured for key-based access, the following command does not prompt you to add the delegate to the list of known hosts, or to provide the password of the root user.
